en: It is a lovely, sunny day,
zh: 今天是个阳光灿烂的日子，

en: and Peppa and George are riding their bicycles.
zh: 佩奇和乔治在骑自行车。

en: That's a fine pumpkin, Daddy Pig!
zh: 这真是一个很不错的南瓜，猪爸爸！

en: Daddy Pig is very proud of his pumpkin.
zh: 猪爸爸对他的南瓜感到很自豪。

en: Pumpkins are the only thing I can grow.
zh: 南瓜是我唯一能种的东西。

en: Probably because I love pumpkin pie!
zh: 这可能是因为我喜欢吃南瓜派吧！

en: Come on, George.
Danny, Suzy, Rebecca!
Peppa and her friends,
Danny Dog, Suzy Sheep and Rebecca Rabbit are riding their bicycles.
zh: 小狗丹尼，小羊苏茜和小兔瑞贝卡在骑自行车。

en: George is riding his tricycle.
He's going so slowly.
Let's race to Daddy Pig's pumpkin.
zh: 让我们来比赛，看谁先到达猪爸爸的南瓜那里。

en: If we race to Daddy's Pumpkin,
zh: 如果我们要骑到爸爸的南瓜那里，

en: We have to be very careful not to bump into it.
zh: 我们得非常小心，千万别撞上去。

en: Daddy would be very sad if the pumpkin got broken.
zh: 如果南瓜撞坏了，爸爸会非常伤心的。

en: Don't Worry, Peppa
Race you!
Peppa and her friends are racing to Daddy Pig's pumpkin!
zh: 佩奇和她的朋友比赛谁先到达南瓜！

en: Hey! Watch out for my pumpkin!!
Peppa! Look out! Daddy's Pumpkin!!!!
zh: 佩奇！小心点！ 爸爸的南瓜啊！！！！

en: Sorry, Daddy!
Look at George! He's going so slowly!
George is still riding a baby bike!
zh: 乔治现在还骑着儿童自行车呢！

en: Yours is a baby bike, too, Peppa!
zh: 你的也是儿童自行车，佩奇！

en: You've still got stabilizers!
zh: 你的车子两旁还有辅助轮！

en: I can ride without my stabilizers.
zh: 我骑的自行车可没有辅助轮的。

en: Me, too.
And me.
Let's ride up the hill again!
Are you coming, Peppa?
No, I think I'll stay here.
zh: 不了，我想我要呆在这里。

en: See you later!
Bye!
Peppa wishes she did not have stabilizers on her bicycle.
zh: 佩奇希望她的自行车上没有辅助轮。

en: Daddy, I don't want stabilizers anymore.
zh: 爸爸，我不想再有辅助轮了。

en: Do you think you can ride without them?
Yes.
Alright, Peppa. Let's take them off.
zh: 那好吧，佩奇。我们把辅助轮卸掉。

en: Daddy Pig is taking the stabilizers off Peppa's bicycle.
zh: 猪爸爸把辅助轮从佩奇的自行车上卸掉。

en: Are you sure you want to ride without stabilizers?
zh: 你确信没有辅助轮你能骑吗？

en: Yes!
You've never done it before.
I can do it. I can! I can!
zh: 我可以做到的。我可以！我可以！

en: It's not funny!
Riding Without stabilizers is not easy.
zh: 没有辅助轮的自行车一点也不容易骑。

en: Would you like some help, Peppa?
Yes, please, Daddy.
Alright. Ready...
Steady... GO!
Don't let go, Daddy!
Don't worry. I've got you.
zh: 不用担心，我会抓紧你的。

en: You're doing really well, Peppa.
Hold on, Daddy!
Just keep pedalling.
Peppa is riding on her own without stabilizers!
zh: 佩奇能自己骑自行车，不需要辅助轮了！

en: Daddy! You let go!
You've been cycling on your own for ages.
zh: 你已经一个人骑了很久了。

en: Have I?
You're really very good at it!
Am I?
Oh, I can do it! Look at me!
Look at me! I can ride my bike properly.
zh: 看看我！我能自己骑两轮自行车了。

en: Danny! Suzy! Rebecca! Look!
I don't need my stabilizers anymore!
Look at me!
Hurray!
Race you to Daddy's pumpkin!
zh: 比赛骑到爸爸的南瓜那里！

en: Peppa, look out my pumpkin!
I'm going to win!
Peppa isn't looking where she is going!
Oh, dear, Peppa has squashed Daddy Pig's pumpkin!
zh: 哦,糟糕了，佩奇把猪爸爸的南瓜撞碎了！

en: Sorry I squashed your pumpkin, Daddy.
zh: 对不起，爸爸，我把南瓜撞碎了。

en: Never mind the pumpkin.
The important thing is that you are okay.
zh: 重要的是你没有受伤就好了。

en: In future, you really must look where you are going.
I promise I will, Daddy.
zh: 我保证我以后会的，爸爸。

en: Good. Anyway, now the pumpkin is broken,
zh: 好吧。既然现在南瓜都已经碎了，

en: I can make it into pumpkin pie!
zh: 我们就用它来做南瓜派吧！

en: I love pumpkin pie!
And because Daddy Pig's pumpkin is so big,
zh: 因为猪爸爸的南瓜很大，

en: there will be enough pumpkin pie for everyone!
zh: 所以我们每个人都可以吃到南瓜派了！

en: Hurray!
